# Satya Nadella’s Post

[!\[\]()](https://www.linkedin.com/in/satyanadella?trk=public_post_feed-actor-image)

[Satya Nadella](https://www.linkedin.com/in/satyanadella?trk=public_post_feed-actor-name)

Satya Nadella is an Influencer

Chairman and CEO at Microsoft

2h

- [Report this post](/uas/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fposts%2Fsatyanadella_sap-and-openai-partner-to-launch-sovereign-activity-7376627188332335104-2h6b&trk=public_post_ellipsis-menu-semaphore-sign-in-redirect&guestReportContentType=POST&_f=guest-reporting)

We’re partnering with [SAP](https://de.linkedin.com/company/sap?trk=public_post-text) and [OpenAI](https://www.linkedin.com/company/openai?trk=public_post-text) to bring the latest AI innovation to Germany’s public sector, powered by Microsoft Azure.

Together, we’ll help millions of German public sector employees use AI safely and responsibly, while meeting the strictest data sovereignty, security, and legal standards. [https://lnkd.in/g9xFHnis](https://www.linkedin.com/redir/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Flnkd%2Ein%2Fg9xFHnis&urlhash=-Nm7&trk=public_post-text)

Description: The post [We’re partnering with SAP and OpenAI to bring the latest AI innovation to Germany’s public sector, powered by Microsoft Azure. Together, we’ll help millions of German public sector employees use AI safely and responsibly, while meeting the strictest data sovereignty, security and legal standards.](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/satyanadella_sap-and-openai-partner-to-launch-sovereign-activity-7376627188332335104-2h6b) appeared first on [Source](https://news.microsoft.com/source).
Author: stclarke
Title: We’re partnering with SAP and OpenAI to bring the latest AI innovation to Germany’s public sector, powered by Microsoft Azure. Together, we’ll help millions of German public sector employees use AI safely and responsibly, while meeting the strictest data sovereignty, security and legal standards.
